title: Enterprise System Engineer, Major Accounts
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products - they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries! It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it! Our technical sales team, is in many ways, the face of Apple to our largest customers.
description: We are trusted advisors on the Apple ecosystem, working multi-functionally to drive business transformation and Apple platform adoption. We deeply understand our customers’ business and technical ambitions. We help remove technical barriers and friction points, and enhance customer readiness for our platform. We create new standard methodologies and share them. Apple doesn’t cut corners, in products or in business. You bring the highest level of integrity, honesty, and accountability in all that you do, every single day. You are a trusted advisor who does what you say you’ll do – and always does what’s best for Apple.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with evaluating sophisticated IT enterprise environments (Deployment, Security, SSO, Zero Trust), Comprehensive understanding of network services and protocols such as TCP/IP, BGP, DMVPN, IPSEC Expert level understanding and practical knowledge of network design for large scale WAN environments demonstrating cellular connectivity, You have experience advising on technical business transformation solutions for large enterprises or at least 5 years of experience in a consultative pre-sales engineering role, Familiarity with Apple’s App development tools and the advantages they bring to large organizations demonstrating mobility for business transformation. Confidently explain the advantages of deploying platform specific apps for business and can appropriately guide customers through the best route to development (build/buy/partner) for a given use case., Experience in Python scripting, Generative AI with Large Language Models, and cyber security., Experience in a highly regulated environment (such as healthcare, government, or financial services)
